H0.text: Increasing the amount of current is what a switch that can open or close an electric circuit can be used to do.

H1.text: Reverse the current's direction is what a switch that can open or close an electric circuit can be used to.

H2.text: Stop the current is what a switch that can open or close an electric circuit can be used to.

H3.text: Accelerate the current is what a switch that can open or close an electric circuit can be used to do.
